title: ZeroFox
description:
The OpenCTI ZeroFox connector can be used to import knowledge from the ZeroFox platform. The connector leverages the Threat Intelligence data feeds to get data about ...
Note: Requires subscription to the ZeroFox CTI feeds. The subscription details dictate what feeds are available to the connector.
